comment_data.body: Ok, from now, if the other person not have you, you can't get the profile picture xD

I am getting the same error. Is it true that WhatsApp is no longer allowing "unknown" contacts to get profile picture of a user?
Or is it some sort of error? possible update?

@shirioko could you please confirm?

Keep up the great work!

Thanks!
this user was in my contacts

@park23: The user whose profile picture you want to fetch should have your contact number in his/her contact list. That is what I am suspecting. 
If shirioko could confirm this?
i know it ,my number have in her/he contacts)  and in my log you can see "id="1379867838" type="image" 58111 byte data /picture"  58111 byte , i get the data ,but can't create image from it (

I test the get profiles with and without my number in the remote contact, I think that the problem have a relations with the wauth2

Saludos Jesús Sales

> El 07/02/2014, a las 14:48, park23 <notifications@github.com> escribió:
> 
> @mayankgupta thank you! now work))
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.

That was my initial hunch too. If this is the case then shirioko's recent work in his fork might fix the issue.
But the problem here is, the with your number in remote contact's list you should be able to get the profile picture just fine?

I catch in some case without the remote hasn't my number

Saludos Jesús Sales

> That was my initial hunch too. If this is the case then shirioko's recent work in his fork might fix the issue.
> But the problem here is, the with your number in remote contact's list you should be able to get the profile picture just fine?

wait, @shirioko its doing shit...

We can use our personal whatsapp to try this, if you can't see the picture of all yours sexy contact girls... Welcome to reality! Theys can't get you, but you can confirm my theory ;)
Jesus, I leave you guys alone for a day and I see my name all over the place

Sorry, but you don't know that everyone think in god where the things isn't good....

Here is the same, everyone think in shirioko when we have a problems, you are the god of the API

;)

Saludos Jesús Sales

title: Get profile picture seems not work
